data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Makarov, Slobodan E., Ćurčić, Božidar P. M., Tomić, Vladimir T., Rađa, Tonći, Rađa, Biljana, Ćurčić, Srećko B., Mitić, Bojan M., Lučić, Luka R. (2011): Revision of the family Heterolatzeliidae (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida). Zootaxa 2994: 33-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202142
